feature.label: jdt launching plugin with long classpath support for Eclipse 4.7.3a
feature.description:
Contains a patched eclipse.jdt.launching plugin : It creates a classpath only jar on Linux when classpath is longer than 131072 (MAX_ARG_STRLEN). This jar is created on the working directory and deleted when process terminates.
MAX_ARG_STRLEN (kernel >= 2.6.23) is the maximum length of a command line argument (or environment variable) and its value is 131072 and cannot be changed without recompiling the kernel.
